title: Good & Bad Definitions of Love
itunes:author: Guest: Bob Lepine
itunes:summary:
It's easy to say, "I love you," during the dating phase of a relationship? But, what does that phrase truly mean. John, Greg and Erin offer a perspective on why saying, "I love you," is a significant phrase to use. Featuring Mr. Bob Lepine.


Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY


Receive the book "Love Like You Mean It" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofm-podcast-2022-10-25?refcd=1503601
